name: Oscar
blurb: A young girl's struggling childhood twists and turns through various art, sound and gameplay styles.

rewards.reward: THE CREDIT - Show up in the credits!\r\n============================= \r\nAlso entitles you to an 80's style, freeze frame high-five should we ever meet.

THE GAME - A copy of the game, 'nuff said.

TOY STORY - Our signature perk! Give Oscar a house full of everyone's favourite childhood toys. Also grants beta access!
============================= 
We'll place your favourite toy along with the other entries in a sentimental adventure house for all Oscar players to explore. Optionally include a story from your childhood memories available by clicking on the toy in-game.

Alpha build tests - Be our guinea pigs to help us see if the game is creating the experience we want!
=============================
INCLUDES ALL PREVIOUS PERKS
THE DEVELOPER - Gain access to the current build of Oscar and follow us as we complete the game. Includes all perks from THE WORKS

THE DINER ============================== Sooo...Vancouver is well known to have some pretty great grub. If you can make it out here on your own, come have dinner with the development team and let's talk shop! Unless you choose sushi, then we'll all just be stuffing our faces.

BEHIND THE CURTAIN ==============================\r\n\r\nEver wanted to be an indie dev? Just want to see the method behind the madness? Come to Vancouver for a personalized tour of our workspace. Chill with us for a day, check out the project and pick our brains (or lack thereof)! Travel expenses not included.
